item.title: Setting up a Ghost blog on a VPS with Docker
item.description: What better way to start out a tech blog than by writing out my process on how I set the blog up? By day, I am an Android developer, so this was a bit out of my comfort zone. Although I have set up a few Wordpress blogs, this was several years ago (pre-Docker), and I was never fond of the amount of effort required to make the aesthetics decent. Ghost looks nice out of the box, and they offer a (limited) selection of free themes.
